metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2162 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A use-after-free vulnerability was found in iscsi_sw_tcp_session_create indrivers/scsi/iscsi_tcp.c in SCSI sub-component in the Linux Kernel. In thisflaw an attacker could leak kernel internal information.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
